alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 11:55PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong, gusty winds on the north side of a thunderstorm complex will impact portions of southeastern Alfalfa, southern Grant, Garfield and eastern Major Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1153 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from the strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jet to 3 miles east of Garber. Movement was northeast at 135 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enid, Fairview, Cherokee, Helena, Waukomis, Pond Creek, Garber, Lahoma, Covington, Ringwood, Drummond, Lamont, Cleo Springs, Kremlin, Goltry, Breckenridge, Ames, Meno, Jet, and Aline. TIME...MOT...LOC 0453Z 233DEG 116KT 3663 9819 3644 9752 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
